content:
Micronuclei formation after misrepaired DSBs increases chromothripsis and neoplasia risk.  
*Supporting evidence:* Micronuclei are linked to chromothripsis and tumorigenesis [Zhang 2015, Nature; "Chromothripsis from DNA damage in micronuclei"].
